original: ku ru kull'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ku ru kull'a s'a dha nam /

original: de nas sngags pa skyes pa dang bud med dag dbang du bya bar 'dod pas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyi ma re re zhing thun gsum du khri phrag re bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas sngags pa skyes pa dang bud med dag dbang du bya bar 'dod pas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyi ma re re zhing thun gsum du khri phrag re bzlas par bya ste /
translated: Then, a mantrin, whether male or female, who wishes to enthrall should begin on an auspicious lunar date and recite ten thousand times each day in three sessions.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma la dmigs shing smad g-yogs dmar po bcings te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma la dmigs shing smad g-yogs dmar po bcings te /
translated: One should visualize the Blessed Lady, wearing a red lower garment,

original: lus la yang legs par gon pa'o //
analyzed: lus la yang legs par gon pa'o //

original: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /

original: rang gi snying @219b gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge hr'i: dmar pos bskyed pa'i padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa rtsa ba skye gnas kyi bar du zug pa rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: rang gi snying @219b gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge hr'i: dmar pos bskyed pa'i padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa rtsa ba skye gnas kyi bar du zug pa rnam par bsams la /
translated: In one’s heart, one should visualize an eight-petaled red lotus generated from a red syllable hrīḥ on a sun, its root penetrating into the secret place.

original: de'i 'dab ma brgyad la ni a'a a'i a'u r'i l'i aee aoo a'a: bya ba dbyangs yig 'di brgyad yongs su gyur pa las bung ba brgyad de /
analyzed: de'i 'dab ma brgyad la ni a'a a'i a'u r'i l'i aee aoo a'a: bya ba dbyangs yig 'di brgyad yongs su gyur pa las bung ba brgyad de /
translated: On its eight petals are the eight vowels a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ, which transform into eight bees.

original: dga' zhing rgyas la khro bar gyur pa kha dog dmar ba rim gyis gnas pa rnams rang gi sna bug gi rlung gis bskul nas rang gi sna bug g-yon pa nas phyung ste /
analyzed: dga' zhing rgyas la khro bar gyur pa kha dog dmar ba rim gyis gnas pa rnams rang gi sna bug gi rlung gis bskul nas rang gi sna bug g-yon pa nas phyung ste /
translated: The red color of the passion, expansion, and anger, which are gradually located, are stimulated by the wind of one's nose and emerge from one's left nostril.

original: bsgrub bya'i sna bug gi bu ga g-yas pa nas rab tu zhugs te rtsa ba nas rnam par nyams par byad bar bltas la /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i sna bug gi bu ga g-yas pa nas rab tu zhugs te rtsa ba nas rnam par nyams par byad bar bltas la /
translated: Having entered the right nostril of the victim, they descend from the root and are seen to destroy.🔽One should meditate on the eight short vowels, a, i, u, r, li, e, o, and am, which are completely transformed.

original: aa ai au ri li ae ao aam bya ba'i dbyangs yig thung du na brgyad po 'di yongs su gyur pa las de dag bsgoms la rna ba'i drung du bkang ba'i autpala dmar po'i mda' gzhu'i tshogs kyis bsgrub bya'i ze'u 'bru phug nas de dag yongs su smin
analyzed: aa ai au ri li ae ao aam bya ba'i dbyangs yig thung du na brgyad po 'di yongs su gyur pa las de dag bsgoms la rna ba'i drung du bkang ba'i autpala dmar po'i mda' gzhu'i tshogs kyis bsgrub bya'i ze'u 'bru phug nas de dag yongs su smin
translated: Having pierced the pistil of the victim with a cluster of arrows of red utpala flowers placed near the ear, they ripen.

original: pa las mdas drangs nas de'i sna bug g-yon pa'i bu gnas nges par 'ongs pas rnal 'byor pa'i sna bug g-yas pa nas de rang gi snying la rab tu zhugs pa rnam par bas ma mo //
analyzed: pa las mdas drangs nas de'i sna bug g-yon pa'i bu gnas nges par 'ongs pas rnal 'byor pa'i sna bug g-yas pa nas de rang gi snying la rab tu zhugs pa rnam par bas ma mo //
translated: Having been drawn by the arrow, they definitely enter the left nostril of the victim and enter the heart of the yogin through his right nostril.

original: phyi nas ni autpala'i yu bas mgrin pa bcings shing skye gnas kyang lcags kyus phug pas lhang kyog bskyod nas 'od zer 'bar bas mchog tu dbang du byas shing de la zhon la dga' ba dang ldan pas sngags bzlas par bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi nas ni autpala'i yu bas mgrin pa bcings shing skye gnas kyang lcags kyus phug pas lhang kyog bskyod nas 'od zer 'bar bas mchog tu dbang du byas shing de la zhon la dga' ba dang ldan pas sngags bzlas par bya ba'o //
translated: Externally, one should visualize her with a lotus stalk tied around her neck and her bhaga pierced by a hook, shaking her hips and swaying, blazing with light, completely enthralled, and mounted on her, with passion, one should recite the mantra.

original: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyis sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyis sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ kuru ku llé hriḥ, so-and-so, bring her under my control svāhā.

original: nyi ma bdun na 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: nyi ma bdun na 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: She will be accomplished in seven days.

original: bung ba'i rnal 'byor gyi ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: bung ba'i rnal 'byor gyi ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs so //
translated: This is the Kurukullā sādhana of the Bumblebee Yoga.

original: aa bha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: aa bha ya las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
